snippet: BARBIERI--Gato. Siento la perdida de mi querido amigo Gato. Fuerte abrazos y condolencias a su familia. I feel the loss of my dear friend Gato. Firm hugs and condolences to his family. Elsa Peretti 1/3
lead_paragraph: BARBIERI--Gato. Siento la perdida de mi querido amigo Gato. Fuerte abrazos y condolencias a su familia. I feel the loss of my dear friend Gato. Firm hugs and condolences to his family. Elsa Peretti 1/3
